type ListCommandEventHandler = delegate of obj * ListCommandEventArgs -> unit

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为控件创建委托时 ,需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate for a control, you identify the method that will handle the event. 生成项事件时会通知处理程序。The notifies the handler when an item event is generated. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时都会调用事件处理程序。Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 对于默认呈现, 控件提供一个用户界面, 用户可通过该 UI 单击各个列表项。For default rendering, the control provides a UI that allows the user to click individual list items. 在回发时, 控件将调用事件处理程序, 并将参数指向源项。On postback, the control calls the event handler, with an argument pointing to the source item. 属性的值为 `null`。The value of the property is `null`. 使用模板进行呈现时, ASP.NET 的事件冒泡机制将调用方法。When rendering with a template, the event bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET calls the method. 向事件处理程序传递一个参数, 该参数指向源项, 并传递给生成事件的控件的属性。The event handler is passed a parameter, pointing to the source item, and to the property of the control that generated the event. 这允许您呈现具有多个关联交互的单个列表项。This allows you to render a single list item with multiple associated interactions. 若要将项呈现为超链接, 可以将属性设置为。 `true`To render an item as a hyperlink, you can set the property to `true`. 属性的值用于显示, 并且在选中时, 属性的内容将用作目标链接地址。The value of the property is used for display, and the contents of the property are used as the target link address when selected. > [!NOTE] > 不会为这些链接生成命令事件。Command events will not be generated for these links.
